revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Union Cave |image = [[File:Union Cave.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Union Cave. |tokens = 3,000 |location = South of Violet City and [[Ruins of Alph]], on Route 32. }} '''Union Cave''' is a dungeon in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in an 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 14 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 63,600 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata || rowspan=2|[[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Russell || rowspan=2|[[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude |- | [[File:Sandshrew.png|40px]] Sandshrew |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || rowspan=3|[[File:Firebreather.png|40px]] Firebreather Bill || rowspan=3|[[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing |- | [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude |- | [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix |- | [[File:Goldeen.png|40px]] Goldeen || rowspan=3|[[File:PokéManiac.png|40px]] PokéManiac Larry || rowspan=3|[[File:Slowpoke.png|40px]] Slowpoke |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Wooper.png|40px]] Wooper |}
<!--T:5--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | rowspan=2|<center>[[File:Lapras.png|40px]] '''Lapras*''' || rowspan=2|<center>450,000 || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Daniel || [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix || rowspan=2|<center>300,000 |- | [[File:Firebreather.png|40px]] Firebreather Ray || [[File:Vulpix.png|40px]] Vulpix |}
<!--T:6--> '''*Lapras only appears on Fridays after obtaining Fog Badge'''
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<tabs> <!--T:8--> <tab name="No Debuff">
<!--T:9--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 2 || 29.99% || 28.80% || 24.00% |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || 2 || 29.99% || 28.80% || 24.00% |- | {{Pokemon|Geodude|mimic}} || N/A || 14.99% || 14.40% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 10.00% || 10.50% || 12.47% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 4.01% || 5.20% || 10.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || N/A || 0.20% || 0.32% || 0.80% |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.20% || 0.32% || 0.80% |- | {{Bag2|Soft Sand}} || 3 || 0.60% || 0.95% || 2.39% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.11% || 0.53% |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || 0.01% || 0.11% || 0.53% |} </tab>
<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:10-->
<!--T:11--> After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
<!--T:12--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|xAttack}} || 2 || 30.00% || 30.00% || 30.00% |- | {{Bag2|xClick}} || 2 || 30.00% || 30.00% || 30.00% |- | {{Pokemon|Geodude|mimic}} || N/A || 15.00% || 15.00% || 15.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | {{Bag2|Yellow Shard}} || N/A || 12.00% || 12.00% || 12.00% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 0.90% || 0.90% || 0.90% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Small Restore}} || N/A || 0.02% || 0.02% || 0.02% |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.02% || 0.02% || 0.02% |- | {{Bag2|Soft Sand}} || 3 || 0.06% || 0.06% || 0.06% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Mythic''' |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || <0.01% || <0.01% || <0.01% |} </tab> </tabs>
